attributes.heading: User Experience
attributes.text: I am well known for my drive to simplify the user experience and map actions to the results that are desired.

attributes.heading: Being Well Rounded
attributes.text: Front end, back end, database...whatever it takes. And, as a product manager I worked with all levels of business to succeed in product development.

attributes.heading: Love of Learning
attributes.text: E-learning has been an interest of mine. It allows me to use a lot of my web development skills combined with my interest in user experience and love for learning.
